1.title: Wayne and Susan Arthurs
1.plot: Wayne and Susan bought their unique log cabin over 30 years ago, but raising a family and busy careers left little time for reno projects and much remains unchanged.

2.title: Dan and Jeff Holland
2.plot: Dan and Jeff Holland are a father son duo who love spending family time at their cottage; however after losing beloved wife and mother, Cathy two years ago, cottage projects have stalled.

3.title: Dave and Jean Moss
3.plot: When Dave and Jean married 13 years ago, the cottage became a special place for their blended family to spend time bonding. Now adults, their children want to surprise their parents with a Weekend Reno as a thank you.

4.title: Kim and Rebecca Hunter
4.plot: Kim and Rebecca Hunter are funeral directors who just recently bought their own funeral home. All the money, time and effort put into their business means little is left over for their cottage.

5.title: Marty and Erica McBride
5.plot: Marty and Erica's dream was to own a cottage on the lake where Marty spent his childhood summers. Finally they scooped one up, but Marty has spent countless weekends renovating rather than enjoying the cottage with his family.

6.title: Rob Wallace and Trish Barnett
6.plot: Rob and Trish are super social and love to entertain, but when they inherited their cottage, they also inherited the dingy carpet and dated décor.

7.title: Chris and Nelly Loreti
7.plot: It took Chris and Nelly years to find their dream cottage, and might have taken them years to agree on a design plan, if they hadn't called in the Weekend Reno team for help.

8.title: Anne Marie Sinasac-Roy and Jim Roy
8.plot: Rumored to be a prize at Expo '67, Anne Marie and Jim's one-of-a-kind cottage, comes with no shortage of renovation challenges, even for the Weekend Reno team.

9.title: Karen, Bill and Andrea Felstead
9.plot: Bill has a sentimental attachment to the cottage he helped build with his father and is reluctant to change a thing, despite the fact that wife Karen and daughter Andrea feel it's stuck in a time warp.

10.title: Norma, Christyn and Ron Oda
10.plot: Renovation projects stalled over ten years ago due to an illness in the family, which also prompted owners Norma and Ron to spend time enjoying the cottage rather than laboring over it.

11.title: Natalie Charlton & Kate Gable
11.plot: This cottage has been in Natalie's family for over a hundred years, and despite its rustic charm, it could use a century's worth of updates, especially the dysfunctional kitchen.

12.title: Crystal & Trevor O'Keefe
12.plot: The O'Keefe's gained a new perspective on life after Crystal's battle with cancer. Determined to live life to the fullest, they bought a cottage where they could spend quality family time with their four kids.

13.title: Karl Galbraith & Merrilee Loewen
13.plot: Karl and Merrilee met several years back, and have yet to transform a twenty-year-old cottage addition into the master bedroom of their dreams. They're looking for a romantic oasis - a far cry from the storage room it is now.

imdb.plot outline: Weekend Reno is about giving tired old cottages a breath of fresh air. Each episode, designer Michelle Mawby and her team have one weekend to transform a cottage. They pull out all the stops, revealing stunning fresh spaces that impress the owners, so they can truly enjoy their weekends at the cottage.
imdb.title: Weekend Reno
plot: _Weekend Reno_ (qv) is about giving tired old cottages a breath of fresh air. Each episode, designer Michelle Mawby and her team have one weekend to transform a cottage.::Mountain Road Productions
